meta.disclaimer: Evidence-linked signals only. No profit promises. Policies are neutral diffs.

board.title: Protocol parameter update detected
board.summary: A verified contract emitted an administrative event consistent with a config update.

board.title: New contract deployment observed
board.summary: A new contract was created and received initial interactions. Treat as high risk until verified.

board.title: Fee regime shift window
board.summary: Network fee conditions deviated from recent baseline. Enforce stricter fee ceilings.

board.title: Launchpool eligibility window detected
board.summary: Program window identified. Prepare policy guardrails for participation workflow and audit logging.

board.title: Megadrop mission cycle observed
board.summary: Megadrop campaign detected. Route through policy-first flow and track evidence receipts.

marketplace.benefit_en: Track eligibility windows and emit auditable policy patches for participation workflows.
marketplace.benefit_pt: Rastreia janelas de elegibilidade e gera policy patches auditaveis para fluxos de participacao.
marketplace.policy_hint_en: Use read-only source ingestion + simulation-first gate before enabling execution.
marketplace.policy_hint_pt: Use ingestao read-only + simulation-first gate antes de habilitar execution.

marketplace.benefit_en: Aggregate campaign updates into one operational board with evidence-linked history.
marketplace.benefit_pt: Agrega atualizacoes de campanhas em um board operacional com historico evidence-linked.
marketplace.policy_hint_en: Keep budgets capped and require human approval for policy promotion.
marketplace.policy_hint_pt: Mantenha budgets limitados e exija aprovacao humana para promover policy.

marketplace.benefit_en: Map chain activity and fee regimes to improve execution timing and operational reliability.
marketplace.benefit_pt: Mapeia atividade da chain e fee regimes para melhorar timing de execution e confiabilidade operacional.
marketplace.policy_hint_en: Enable fee ceilings and circuit breakers for adverse fee conditions.
marketplace.policy_hint_pt: Ative fee ceilings e circuit breakers para condicoes adversas de fee.

marketplace.benefit_en: Consolidate listing/program updates into policy-ready checklists for operator review.
marketplace.benefit_pt: Consolida atualizacoes de listing/programa em checklists policy-ready para revisao do operador.
marketplace.policy_hint_en: New opportunities remain disabled until allowlists and risk checks are confirmed.
marketplace.policy_hint_pt: Novas oportunidades ficam desabilitadas ate allowlists e risk checks serem confirmados.

marketplace.benefit_en: Organize VIP and partner program requirements into auditable operating policies.
marketplace.benefit_pt: Organiza requisitos de programas VIP e parceiros em politicas operacionais auditaveis.
marketplace.policy_hint_en: Apply least-privilege keys and separate profiles by environment.
marketplace.policy_hint_pt: Aplique chaves com menor privilegio e perfis separados por ambiente.

marketplace.title_pt: Camada de Utilidade Wallet e Pay
marketplace.benefit_en: Track payment and wallet utility features as operational extensions, not trading signals.
marketplace.benefit_pt: Rastreia recursos de pagamento e carteira como extensoes operacionais, nao como trading signals.
marketplace.policy_hint_en: Use operational segmentation to isolate payment flows from execution keys.
marketplace.policy_hint_pt: Use segmentacao operacional para isolar fluxos de pagamento das chaves de execution.
